iati-activity.title: 2KEN014/235 Electoral process strengthened
iati-activity.description: 2KEN014/235 Strengthening the Electoral Processes in Kenya Project (SEPK)

iati-activity.title: 2KEN014/235 Strengthening the
iati-activity.description: The project (SEPK 2015-2018) is designed to: a) consolidate and build on the gains made from the constitutional transition process and the 2013 elections to strengthen and b) develop sustainable and just election institutions, systems and processes.
